001package io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders;
002
003import java.io.Serializable;
004import java.util.function.Supplier;
005
006import org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge;
007import org.jgrapht.graph.SimpleGraph;
008import org.slf4j.Logger;
009import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
010
011import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutableSocialRelationship;
012import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModifiableOutbreak;
013import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Person;
014import io.github.ai4ci.abm.SocialRelationship;
015import io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.SetupConfiguration;
016import io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler;
017import io.github.ai4ci.util.ThreadSafeArray;
018import it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.ints.IntIntImmutableSortedPair;
019
020/**
021 * Provides a setupOutbreak default function that can be mixed and matched with
022 * other setup components to configure the setup process. The purpose of this
023 * default setup is to build a social network based on the network configuration
024 * options supplied. This is config driven by
025 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.NetworkConfiguration}. In the second
026 * stage it determines the weight of the social network
027 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.DemographicConfiguration}
028 *
029 * @see DefaultModelBuilder
030 * @see AbstractModelBuilder
031 * @see io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.NetworkConfiguration
032 * @see io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.DemographicConfiguration
033 *
034 */
035public interface DefaultNetworkSetup {
036
037        /**
038         * Logger for this class.
039         */
040        static Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(DefaultNetworkSetup.class);
041
042        /**
043         * Default outbreak setup function that builds a social network based on the
044         * network configuration supplied. The network is built using JGraphT and
045         * then converted to a thread safe array of social relationships. The
046         * relationship strengths are determined by the demographic configuration.
047         * The resulting social network is set on the outbreak and the outbreak is
048         * returned for further processing by other setup functions.
049         *
050         * @param outbreak    the outbreak to set up
051         * @param setupConfig the setup configuration containing network and
052         *                    demographic settings
053         * @param sampler     a sampler for generating random numbers used in network
054         *                    construction and relationship strength assignment
055         * @return the outbreak with the social network set up
056         */
057        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
058        default ModifiableOutbreak setupOutbreak(
059                        ModifiableOutbreak outbreak, SetupConfiguration setupConfig,
060                        Sampler sampler
061        ) {
062
063                SimpleGraph<Person, DefaultEdge> socialNetwork = new SimpleGraph<>(
064                                (Supplier<Person> & Serializable) () -> setupConfig
065                                                .getDemographics().createPersonStub(outbreak),
066                                (Supplier<DefaultEdge> & Serializable) () -> new DefaultEdge(),
067                                false
068                );
069
070                log.debug("Initialising network config");
071
072                // The type of graph build depends on the configuration supplied
073                // E.g. may be Erdos-Reyni etc.
074                setupConfig.getNetwork().generateGraph(socialNetwork);
075
076                // This sets the weight of the network.
077                // socialNetwork.edgeSet().forEach(r -> socialNetwork.setEdgeWeight(r,
078                // sampler.uniform()));
079                // This is configuration determined by the DemographicConfiguration
080                // E.g. AgeStratified
081                int size = (int) socialNetwork.iterables().edgeCount();
082
083                ThreadSafeArray<SocialRelationship> relationships = new ThreadSafeArray<>(
084                                SocialRelationship.class, size
085                );
086                socialNetwork.edgeSet().parallelStream().forEach(e -> {
087                        Person source = socialNetwork.getEdgeSource(e);
088                        Person target = socialNetwork.getEdgeTarget(e);
089                        relationships.put(
090                                        ImmutableSocialRelationship.builder().setRelationshipStrength(
091                                                        setupConfig.getDemographics()
092                                                                        .getRelationshipStrength(source, target, sampler)
093                                        ).setPeopleIds(
094                                                        IntIntImmutableSortedPair
095                                                                        .of(source.getId(), target.getId())
096                                        ).build()
097                        );
098                });
099
100                outbreak.getPeople().finish();
101                relationships.finish();
102
103                outbreak.setSocialNetwork(relationships);
104                log.debug(
105                                "contact graph {} edges, {} average degree ",
106                                outbreak.getSocialNetwork().size(),
107                                (outbreak.getSocialNetwork().size() * 2.0)
108                                                / outbreak.getPopulationSize()
109                );
110                return outbreak;
111        }
112
113}
